title: Cooper Hewitt font
content:
Who’da thunk? The Cooper Hewitt Museum is giving away its brand new face.

[http://www.cooperhewitt.org/colophon/cooper-hewitt-the-typeface-by-chester-jenkins/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235559/http:/www.cooperhewitt.org/colophon/cooper-hewitt-the-typeface-by-chester-jenkins/)
